  • Classes in goal.tools.mc.program.goal used by goal.tools.mc.evaluator.goal 
    Class and Description
    GOALMentalStateConverter
    Represents a mental state converter.
  • Classes in goal.tools.mc.program.goal used by goal.tools.mc.program.goal 
    Class and Description
    GOALConversionElement
    Represents a GOAL conversion element.
    GOALConversionUniverse
    Represents a conversion universe for GOAL, such that BitSets can be quickly converted to mental states and vice versa.
    GOALMentalStateConverter
    Represents a mental state converter.
    GOALState
    Represents a state in program automaton corresponding to a single-agent GOAL system in the absence of an environment as represented by GOALProg.
  • Classes in goal.tools.mc.program.goal used by goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog 
    Class and Description
    GOALProg
    Represents a program component for a single-agent GOAL system in the absence of an environment.
  • Classes in goal.tools.mc.program.goal used by goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog.trans
